modName: Replace Unrelenting Force with Dicks Freedom of Speech parrot - DELETED
summary: This mod replaces all instances of Unrelenting Force (Fus-Ro-Dah) with the freedom of speech parrot quote(Freedom of speech-doesn`t mean-freedom from consequences) from the Dick Show podcast.
descriptionHtml:
I have barely tested it so I have no idea how well it works, so let me know if you find any errors or crashes while using this mod.

To install, just drag into the Wyre Bash installer tab, right click to install, or simply unzip directly into the Data folder of your Skyrim installation.

GFY.

[youtube]UtXAxk9nDcQ[/youtube]
author: Ruben Albarran
